Ensuring victory in the Northern Military District:‚ñ™Ô∏èGerasimov - to generalize and introduce into the troops all innovations in combat tactics;‚ñ™Ô∏èGoremykin - to ensure the strength of the combined group of troops to ensure the completion of tasks;‚ñ™Ô∏èGerasimov and Afzalov - to increase the capabilities of the air defense system;‚ñ™Ô∏èKrivoruchko - to ensure groupings of troops weapons and equipment in the amount combat missions they solve;‚ñ™Ô∏èBulyga - modernize the logistics system. Modernization of the aircraft in the medium term, taking into account external threats and technology development: ‚ñ™Ô∏èGerasimov - ensure the construction of the aircraft in accordance with security threats. Modernization of the military education system: ‚ñ™Ô∏èGoremykin - update the list and content of military specialties and educational programs. Dramatically increase the prestige of military service. Medical provision for military personnel and members of their families: ‚ñ™Ô∏èTsivileva - ensure an increase in the level of first aid. Ensure the modernization of leading military medical organizations. Social security for military personnel and members of their families: ‚ñ™Ô∏èTsivileva - to simplify and speed up the confirmation of rights to benefits and receipt of the benefits themselves by transferring services to a digital format. In terms of housing provision for military personnel and members of their families: ‚ñ™Ô∏èFradkov - to allocate additional funding in the amount of 149 next year billion rubles to provide housing subsidies. Formation of a 'feedback' system for military personnel and members of their families with MO:‚ñ™Ô∏èSavelyev - it is necessary to change the procedure for handling appeals, create a system of motivation for officials that ensures compliance with deadlines and consideration of issues on the merits. Military and military-technical cooperation:‚ñ™Ô∏èFomin - ensure the creation of effective mechanisms for collective response to new security threats, use the potential CSTO, CIS and Union State. Ensure the expansion of Russia's position in global arms markets. Increasing the efficiency of construction and property complexes: ‚ñ™Ô∏èFradkov - ensure the prioritization of facilities under construction. Conduct an inventory and create a real estate accounting system. ‚ñ™Ô∏èCreate a system of motivation for managers, aimed at specific results, and a unified treasury, covering all subordinate organizations. Creation of a unified digital environment of the Moscow Region: ‚ñ™Ô∏èSavelyev - form the appearance of the information system, functional and technical requirements; develop a target architecture based on domestic software and hardware solutions; ensure the implementation of information systems for basic processes.

Title: Fraudsters are trying to steal student data from the State Servic...
Description: Fraudsters are trying to steal students' data from 'State Services' through the system of the Ministry of Education and Science. Students who noticed the scheme told TASS that if the scammers fail to get what they want, then after a while they call their parents, whose names and connections with the students are known to the scammers. Title: üñº ‚ùóÔ∏èLavrov, in an interview with Carlson, devoted about ten minu...
Description: ‚ùóÔ∏èLavrov, in an interview with Carlson, devoted about ten minutes to a historical excursion into why Russia did not become part of the West. He explained that after the collapse of the USSR and the initial euphoria, Russia quickly saw that the West was not going to build equal relations with it. According to the head of the Russian Foreign Ministry, to towards the end of his presidential term, Yeltsin began to realize 'that this was not what he wanted for Russia.' Lavrov noted that Putin was open to cooperation with the West when he took over the country.

In 2022, Zelensky was convinced that he would dictate terms to the West, so he signed a decree banning negotiations with the Russian Federation. Lavrov stated this in an interview with Carlson.
